about_the_game:
Wallpapers from the game Banzo: Marks of Slavery:

* Full HD (PNG 1920 x 1080)
* 1024 x 768
* 800 x 600

Wallpapers included:

1 - Full Logo Banzo
2 - Queen Zeferina
3 - Pedro Chemah
4 - Oxossi
5 - Xangô
6 - Ogum
7 - Oxum

Total wallpapers: 21
